TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlServices extends System.Object
public ref class SqlServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 支援安裝和移除 ASP.NET 功能的 SQL Server 資料庫項目。

span.span: Supports installing and removing the SQL Server database elements of ASP.NET features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 SQL Server 資料庫來儲存 ASP.NET 功能，例如工作階段狀態、 成員資格、 Web 組件個人化和角色管理的資訊。You can use SQL Server databases to store information for ASP.NET features such as session state, membership, Web parts personalization, and role management. 這些功能需要連線到 SQL Server 資料庫，在使用前先正確設定。These features require that the SQL Server database to which they are connected be properly configured before use. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 註冊 SQL 工具 (aspnet_regsql.exe) 若要這樣做，或您可以呼叫所公開的靜態方法直接從程式碼的類別。You can use the ASP.NET Register SQL tool (aspnet_regsql.exe) to do this, or you can call the static methods exposed by the class directly from your code. > [!NOTE] > 使用 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具或設定資料庫類別只會設定提供者會使用具有適當的資料表、 觸發程序和預存程序的資料庫。Using the aspnet_regsql.exe tool or the class to configure the database only sets up the database that the providers will use with the proper tables, triggers, and stored procedures. 設定資料庫，如此一來，不會修改組態檔來指定這些功能會使用這些服務的 SQL 提供者。Configuring the database in this way does not modify configuration files to specify that these features use the SQL Providers for these services. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/CS/usingsqlservices.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/VB/usingsqlservices.vb#1)]

related.span: 安裝 SQL Server 提供者資料庫

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database

related.span: 工作階段狀態模式

span.span: Session State Modes

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GenerateApplicationServicesScripts (bool install, System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures features, string database);
.method public static hidebysig string GenerateApplicationServicesScripts(bool install, valuetype System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures features, string database) cil managed
Public Shared Function GenerateApplicationServicesScripts (install As Boolean, features As SqlFeatures, database As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ GenerateApplicationServicesScripts(bool install, System::Web::Management::SqlFeatures features, System::String ^ database);
static member GenerateApplicationServicesScripts : bool * System.Web.Management.SqlFeatures * string -> string

param.name: install
param.span: 表示產生安裝指定功能的指令碼， 表示產生移除功能的指令碼。

span.span: to generate a script that installs the specified features; to generate a script that removes the features.

param.name: features
param.span: 值的位元組合，指定要產生指令碼的特定功能。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values, specifying the specific features for which to generate scripts.

param.name: database
param.span: 產生的指令碼所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫名稱。

span.span: The name of the SQL Server database to use in the generated scripts.

summary.span: 產生選取功能的 SQL 指令碼。

span.span: Generates the SQL scripts for the selected features.

summary.span: 這些指令碼會參考由資料庫參數指示的資料庫。

span.span: The scripts will reference the database indicated by the database parameter.
Returns the generated script code.

related.span: 安裝 SQL Server 提供者資料庫

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GenerateSessionStateScripts (bool install, System.Web.Management.SessionStateType type, string customDatabase);
.method public static hidebysig string GenerateSessionStateScripts(bool install, valuetype System.Web.Management.SessionStateType type, string customDatabase) cil managed
Public Shared Function GenerateSessionStateScripts (install As Boolean, type As SessionStateType, customDatabase As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ GenerateSessionStateScripts(bool install, System::Web::Management::SessionStateType type, System::String ^ customDatabase);
static member GenerateSessionStateScripts : bool * System.Web.Management.SessionStateType * string -> string

param.name: install
param.span: 表示產生安裝指定功能的指令碼， 表示產生移除功能的指令碼。

span.span: to generate a script that installs the specified features; to generate a script that removes the features.

param.name: type
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定要產生指令碼的工作階段狀態類型。

span.span: One of the values, specifying the type of session state for which to generate scripts.

param.name: customDatabase
param.span: 產生的指令碼所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫名稱。

span.span: The name of the SQL Server database to use in the generated scripts.

summary.span: 產生安裝或移除工作階段狀態的 SQL 指令碼。

span.span: Generates the SQL script for installing or removing session state.

summary.span: 此指令碼會參考由資料庫參數指示的資料庫。

span.span: The script will reference the database indicated by the database parameter.
Returns the generated script code.

exception.span: 類型是 且未提供 值，或類型是 或 且 值不為 null。

span.span: The type is and the value is not supplied, or the type is either or and the value is not null.

param.span: 要安裝功能的資料庫伺服器。

span.span: The database server on which to install the features.

param.span: 要安裝功能的資料庫。

summary.span: 在 SQL Server 資料庫上安裝選取 ASP.NET 功能的元件。

span.span: Installs components for selected ASP.NET features on a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`database`已`null`不提供，或會使用預設的資料庫， `aspnetdb`。If `database` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default database, `aspnetdb`. 如果`server`已`null`或未提供，會使用預設 SQL Server 執行個體。If `server` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default SQL Server instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料庫伺服器的連線會使用信任連接。The connection to the database server is made with a trusted connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的類別。The following code example shows how to use the method of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/CS/usingsqlservices.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.SqlServices#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.SqlServices/VB/usingsqlservices.vb#4)]

exception.span: 無法連接至指定的資料庫伺服器。

span.span: Unable to connect to the specified database server.

exception.span: 值包含一或多個無效旗標。

span.span: The value contains one or more invalid flags.

exception.span: 處理作業所需要的 SQL 陳述式時，會發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred while processing the SQL statements required for the operation.

related.span: 安裝 SQL Server 提供者資料庫

span.span: Installing the SQL Server Provider Database

exception.span: 值包含一或多個無效旗標。

span.span: The value contained one or more invalid flags.

exception.span: 處理作業所需要的 SQL 陳述式、嘗試從不存在的資料庫移除，或者指定資料庫中一或多個功能的資料表包含資料時，便會發生例外狀況。

span.span: An exception occurred while processing the SQL statements required for the operation, an attempt was made to uninstall from a nonexistent database, or one or more tables for the features in the specified database contained data.

summary.span: 從 SQL Server 資料庫移除選取 ASP.NET 功能的元件。

span.span: Removes components for selected ASP.NET features from a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`database`已`null`不提供，或會使用預設資料庫`aspnetdb`。If `database` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default database `aspnetdb`. > [!NOTE] > 資料庫伺服器的連線會使用信任連接。The connection to the database server is made with a trusted connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的型別。The following code example shows how to use the method of the type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`database`已`null`不提供，或會使用預設的資料庫， `aspnetdb`。If `database` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default database, `aspnetdb`. 如果`server`已`null`或未提供，會使用預設 SQL Server 執行個體。If `server` is `null` or not supplied, will use the default SQL Server instance. > [!NOTE] > 資料庫伺服器的連線會使用信任連接。The connection to the database server is made with a trusted connection.
